channel.title: Comments on: Links for Tue 13 Nov 2007

item.title: By: Allan Young
item.dc:creator: Allan Young
item.description: People make fun of the author's English skills on the Amazon reviews, but it's a pretty good book for beginners (like me) and intermediate users. It touches on more topics than the other WordPress book on the market by Langer and Jordan. I'd recommend it to most folks until you write a book for WordPress users Joseph :)
item.content:encoded: People make fun of the author’s English skills on the Amazon reviews, but it’s a pretty good book for beginners (like me) and intermediate users. It touches on more topics than the other WordPress book on the market by Langer and Jordan. I’d recommend it to most folks until you write a book for WordPress users Joseph ðŸ™‚
